summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3755 for the improvement of 6th Avenue South, from Lander Street to Spokane Street; by filling and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46237, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
